name: Mewtwo
effect: (This card cannot be used at official tournaments.)
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: A Pokémon whose genetic code was repeatedly recombined for research. It turned vicious as a result.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Barrier
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon. If 1 of your Pokémon used Barrier during your last turn, this attack can’t be used.
